meanings.definition: To call upon to do something specified.
meanings.sent1: She summoned her dog to come inside.
meanings.sent2: The wizard summoned a powerful spell to defeat the dragon.
meanings.sent3: The teacher summoned the students to solve a tricky math problem.
meanings.sent4: The captain summoned all his courage to face the storm.
meanings.sent5: The hero summoned all his strength to lift the heavy boulder.

meanings.definition: To call for the presence of.
meanings.sent1: The king summoned his advisors to discuss the kingdom's future.
meanings.sent2: The police officer summoned backup to handle the situation.
meanings.sent3: The cat summoned its owner by meowing loudly at the door.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked cookies summoned everyone to the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the bell summoned the villagers to the town square.
